text: @realDonaldTrump Your emphasis was on oil & gas purchases, which was irrelevant to the Families First Coronavirus Response Act. You are so diabolical cunning. Always trying to take credit for something you did not agree with. You switched gears because your hands were tied. You DEVIL. Oil & Gas!!
